name: NBCNews
text:
"I am raising a 7-year-old black son with autism spectrum disorder. If you ask his favorite color, singular, he will reply 'red white and blue like the American flag.'"

In their words: Why black men and women are protesting for George Floyd. https://t.co/7dFbHxWQyX

name: NBCNews
text:
RT @shaqbrewster: The scene tonight in South Minneapolis. 

I’d be lying if I said this didn’t warm my heart. https://t.co/JBLeH6UsTu

name: NBCNews
text: "The use of everyday, mundane technologies like tip reporting websites...is how repressive social control gets normalized," one expert said. "It normalizes fascism, state control and undermines democratic rights to free speech and protests." https://t.co/4YOZbyzLQJ

name: NBCNews
text:
On Ep. 22 of #IntoAmerica: @trymainelee talks to Tim Wise, an anti-racist essayist, author and educator, about what white people can do to dismantle the systems of inequality in this country.

Listen now: https://t.co/jrD5WSoDvX https://t.co/lgAFBn8x2m

name: NBCNews
text: "Our objective was to answer the question of whether hydroxychloroquine worked to prevent disease or did not work," the lead researcher said, adding the team was "disappointed that this did not prevent COVID-19." https://t.co/sJpXcjjoug
